sent.orig: Two cases of shoulder petoneal muscular atrophy (SPMA),a rare type of charcot-Marie- Tooth disease,are reported.
sent.trans: 本文报告两例进行性神经性肌萎缩症(Charcot-Marie-Tooth)的少见特殊类型-肩胛腓骨萎缩型，亦属慢性遗传性进行性周围神经病的变异型之一。

sent.orig: Inherent tooth, iron broken tooth, what tooth to still have?
sent.trans: 天生牙，铁碎牙，还有什么牙？

sent.orig: It turned out that the previous tooth ache wasn't because of tooth decay but wisdom tooth!
sent.trans: 之前的牙痛并不是因为蛀牙，而是因为要长智慧牙！

sent.orig: The chose of tooth brush, tooth line as well as tooth paste are guided.
sent.trans: 对牙刷、牙线以及牙膏的选择进行了指导，并对其功能、作用和使用方法进行了概述。

sent.orig: The tooth of tooth-razor was broken during work.
sent.trans: 摘要某剃齿刀在工作过程中发生断齿。
